attributes.action: Ban carparking charges in town centre carparks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These charges make shopping more expensive, and it doesnt help 'failing' main street shops, nor encourage shoppers to support them. Hence leaving all the 'cream' of profits to go to the giant supermarkets, who really arent so cheap at all, just convenient.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
